marklogic.body:
Alright... Going to "Gun it" here.
He had said that he wanted nothing to do with the business, completely removed himself from it, went to Hollywood... Left it all behind him.
Now he's back: First thing that comes out of his mouth is that he won't leave again... And in the blink of an eye... He's gone... AGAIN.
Jericho told everybody he'd be leaving and coming back. Stone Cold has the same problem Edge does, idiot. And Taker is banged up over twenty years. So all you're points are invalid. And I've explained why he only "attacks" Dwayne.
